name: .ACV
summary: Learn about .ACV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an ACV file with Adobe Photoshop, in the Curves tool:
Open the Curves tool (Image → Adjustments → Curves...).
Select the Gear icon that appears next to the Preset: field.
Navigate to and open your ACV file.
The color adjustment curve your ACV file contains will then appear in the Curves tool, where you can apply it to the image you are editing.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .acv file in Adobe Photoshop
images.caption: ACV file open in Adobe Photoshop
